Title: Prohibits an individual convicted of a crime involving elder abuse from inheriting from the elder's estate as a distributee
Summary: Prohibits an individual convicted of a crime involving elder abuse from inheriting from the elder's estate as a distributee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the estates, powers and trusts law, in relation to prohibiting an individual convicted of a crime involving elder abuse from inheriting from the elder's estate as a distributee
